content.heading: <rp> Tag
paragraphs: The <rp> tag provides parentheses for ruby text in non-supporting browsers.

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Used with <ruby> and <rt> for fallback in ruby annotations.

content.heading: Browser Support
paragraphs: Supported since Chrome 5, Edge 5.5, Firefox 38, Safari 5, Opera 15.
